descriptionHtml:
============
[color=pink]DESCRIPTION[/color]
============
This mod add Aldera - High Elf
Marryable , Essential , 1H weapon , Heavy Armor
[color=pink]You can find her in Kynes Grove , Braid Wood Inn[/color]
I hope you like it

=============
[color=pink]RECOMMENDED[/color]
=============
Better Females By Bella


=============
[color=pink]REQUIRED[/color]
=============
Apachii Sky Hair Female 1.0


=============
[color=pink]INSTALLATION [/color]
=============
Setup all files to your data folder

=============
[color=pink]UNINSTALLATION[/color]
=============
Delete bsa and esp files
_______________________

[color=pink]CREDITS:[/color]
